kafka.bridge.hadoop

类 KafkaOutputFormat<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<K,V>

  • public class KafkaOutputFormat<K,V>
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<K,V>

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String KAFKA_CONFIG_PREFIX 
      static int KAFKA_QUEUE_BYTES
      Bytes to buffer before the OutputFormat does a send (i.e., the amortization window): We set the default to a million bytes so that the server will not reject the batch of messages with a MessageSizeTooLargeException.

      • KAFKA_URL

        public static final java.lang.String KAFKA_URL
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • KAFKA_QUEUE_BYTES

        public static final int KAFKA_QUEUE_BYTES
        Bytes to buffer before the OutputFormat does a send (i.e., the amortization window): We set the default to a million bytes so that the server will not reject the batch of messages with a MessageSizeTooLargeException. The actual size will be smaller after compression.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • KAFKA_CONFIG_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String KAFKA_CONFIG_PREFIX
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
